definitions.title: adv. of time,
definitions.body: not yet, ere, before that (deriv. unknown: not found in cogn. Languages)—construed mostly with the impf. (with the pf. only Ge 24:15 (v:Ge 24:45 impf.), 1Sa 3:7 a (v:b impf.), and [[בְּטֶרֶם]] Ps 90:2 Pr 8:25):—

† [[טֶרֶס]] in an independent sentence, not yet, Ge 2:5 and all the plants of the field [[טרם יהיה בארץ]] were not yet in the earth, etc., Ge 19:4 [[טרם ישׁכבו]] not yet had they lain down, when etc., Ge 24:15, Ge 24:45, Nu 11:33, Jos 2:8, 1Sa 3:3, 1Sa 3:7, 1Sa 3:7; of present time, Ex 9:30, Ex 10:7 [[הֲטֶרֶם תֵּדַע]] dost thou not yet know, etc.?; in a subord. clause, ere, before that, Ex 12:34 they took their dough [[טרם יחמץ]] before it was leavened, Jos 3:1, Ps 119:67; of future time Is 65:24. More frequently

[[בְּטֶרֶם]]:39, with the same force: of past time, Ge 27:33 I ate of all [[בטרס תבא]] before thou camest, Ge 37:18, Ge 41:50, Ju Jdg 14:18, 1Sa 2:15, Je 1:5, Je 47:1, Ez Eze 16:57; Ps 90:2, Pr 8:25 (both with pf.); more oft. of pres. or fut., as Ge 27:4 [[בטרם אמזת]] before I die (so Ge 45:28, cf. Ps 39:14, Job 10:21), Le 14:36, De 31:21, 1Sa 9:13, 2Ki 2:9, Is 7:16, Is 42:9, Is 48:5, Je 13:16; the impf. with a freq. force, Ex 1:19 before the midwife cometh, they are wont to bear, Ru 3:14, Pr 18:13. Pleon. [[בְּטֶרֶם לאׁ]] Zep 2:2, Zep 2:2. Construed with a subst. in the gen., † Is 17:14 [[בְּטֶרֶם בּׂקֶר]] = ere morning, Is 28:4 [[בְּטֶרֶם קַיִץ]]; with an inf. † Zep 2:2 (but rd. here with LXX We [[בְּטֶרֶם לאׂ]] [[תֵהְיוּן כְּמוֹץ עׂבֵר]], without [[יוֹם]], ‘before ye become as chaff passing away’).
† [[מִטֶּרֶם]] Hag 2:15 (sq. inf.) [[מִטֶּרֶם שׂוּם אֶבֶן]] from before the laying of one stone upon another, etc.
